rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes signs of elimination potential using neutral language.
The segment uses 'have', 'are', 'will be able to eliminate' (future/potential), 'said'.
No loaded rhetorical question is present.
The segment contains a confidence statement from an official source about future control ('we will be able to eliminate this').
